name: Vegan Buttery Drop Biscuits
author: dolly
summary: You wouldn't believe that  these moist, buttery biscuits are vegan!
ingredients: ½ cup coconut milk (such as Coconut Dream®)
¼ cup vegan butter (such as Earth Balance®), melted
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a baking pan with parchment paper
Sift flour into a bowl and add sugar, baking powder, and salt
Add coconut milk and vegan butter; mix together gently until combined
Drop batter by heaping tablespoonfuls onto the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until sides or tops are golden, 10 to 13 minutes
Let sit for 2 minutes before serving
